articles.title: Patriots were reportedly among teams who checked in on Micah Parsons before trade
articles.description:
Patriots head coach Mike Vrabel previously said that the cost to get Parsons was too much for the team to give up.

The post Patriots were reportedly among teams who checked in on Micah Parsons before trade appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots explored trade options for Micah Parsons before the deadline.
Head coach Mike Vrabel indicated the trade cost was prohibitive for the team.
Boston fans may feel disappointed by the missed opportunity for a star player.

articles.title: Patriots reportedly told team staffer to not wear UNC shirt in team’s weight room
articles.description:
It's just the latest chapter of drama between Bill Belichick and the Patriots.

The post Patriots reportedly told team staffer to not wear UNC shirt in team’s weight room appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots staffer instructed to avoid wearing UNC shirt in weight room.
Conflict highlights ongoing tensions between head coach Bill Belichick and team culture.
Local fans concerned about team unity as season approaches.
